title: Revolutionary
description: A team in mourning. A town in chaos. A secret that changes everything. The powers that be have decided to dangle the idea of freedom before the Enhanced but Minefield is all we've known. Many are afraid to leave, their fight or flight modes kicking in. With special abilities abounding, our job becomes nearly impossible. Cue new recruits. The arrival of new blood forces me into a position I never trainer. Making nice has never been my strong suit and being asked to shape hearts and minds can only backfire. On top of that, my team and I are slated to be guinea pigs for the Enhanced release program and are being thrown into the world as a test group. Hoping to enjoy my first time outside of Minefield's walls, I can't fathom the horror turning our field trip from a social experiment into something resembling my own personal Hell. With fear at the helm, my team will stop at nothing to make us whole again. Even if it means becoming exactly what the world thinks we dangerous .
author: LeAnn Mason
